page.title: 15ACTIVITIES - BRITISH LEGION
page.content: The British Legion is open every night,and the various clubs meet on different evenings. The{Football Club}runs 2 teams. In the 2 years since it started, the A team has gone from the 4th to the 2nd division of its league. The{Darts Club}have 4 teams, a mixed team and 3 men's teams; they won the cup in the "Pubs and Clubs knock out" competition this year. There is a{Pool Team}which plays competitively on Thursday evenings. The{Over 60's Social Club}meets fortnightly on a Thursday afternoon. They have 38 members, and a wide variety of activities which include lectures, card games, trips, tea parties a Christmas lunch and a trading stall, enabling them to make donations to various charities each year.
